segment.source: Service a Windows Image Using DISM
segment.target: Service a Windows Image Using DISM

segment.source: Service a Windows Image Using DISM
segment.target: Service a Windows Image Using DISM

segment.source: Service a Windows Image Using DISM
segment.target: Service a Windows Image Using DISM

segment.source: The Deployment Image Servicing and Management (DISM) tool lets users enumerate drivers and packages, modify configuration settings, add and remove drivers without using an unattended answer file, and more.
segment.target: The Deployment Image Servicing and Management (DISM) tool lets users enumerate drivers and packages, modify configuration settings, add and remove drivers without using an unattended answer file, and more.

segment.source: You can use DISM offline on a WIM or VHD file, or online on a running operating system.
segment.target: You can use DISM offline on a WIM or VHD file, or online on a running operating system.

segment.source: Offline servicing allows you to modify or service a Windows® image entirely offline, without booting it first.
segment.target: Offline servicing allows you to modify or service a Windows® image entirely offline, without booting it first.

segment.source: This can reduce deployment costs because you can customize images to a degree before the operating system is deployed to the computer.
segment.target: This can reduce deployment costs because you can customize images to a degree before the operating system is deployed to the computer.

segment.source: In addition, if you have a stored master image that you want to make sure is always up to date, you can maintain it without booting the image.
segment.target: In addition, if you have a stored master image that you want to make sure is always up to date, you can maintain it without booting the image.

segment.source: You can also use DISM to service an image online.
segment.target: You can also use DISM to service an image online.

segment.source: If you have to boot the operating system to install an application or test and validate the installation, you can boot to audit mode and add drivers and packages, or enable features and international settings.
segment.target: If you have to boot the operating system to install an application or test and validate the installation, you can boot to audit mode and add drivers and packages, or enable features and international settings.

segment.source: In This Section
segment.target: In This Section

segment.source: Add and Remove Drivers to an Offline Windows Image
segment.target: Add and Remove Drivers to an Offline Windows Image

segment.source: Add or remove drivers from an offline image using either DISM or an unattended answer file.
segment.target: Add or remove drivers from an offline image using either DISM or an unattended answer file.

segment.source: Enable or Disable Windows Features Using DISM
segment.target: Enable or Disable Windows Features Using DISM

segment.source: Enable or disable features in a Windows image using DISM.
segment.target: Enable or disable features in a Windows image using DISM.

segment.source: You can also remove a feature to install on-demand, and restore a previously removed feature.
segment.target: You can also remove a feature to install on-demand, and restore a previously removed feature.

segment.source: Add or Remove Packages Offline Using DISM
segment.target: Add or Remove Packages Offline Using DISM

segment.source: Add or remove packages from an offline image using either DISM or an unattended answer file.
segment.target: Add or remove packages from an offline image using either DISM or an unattended answer file.

segment.source: Add and Remove Language Packs Offline Using DISM
segment.target: Add and Remove Language Packs Offline Using DISM

segment.source: Add or remove language packs and configure international settings in an offline image using DISM.
segment.target: Add or remove language packs and configure international settings in an offline image using DISM.

segment.source: Sideload Apps with DISM
segment.target: Sideload Apps with DISM

segment.source: Install line-of-business (LOB) Windows Store apps to a Windows image by using Windows PowerShell® or the Deployment Image Servicing and Management (DISM) platform.
segment.target: Install line-of-business (LOB) Windows Store apps to a Windows image by using Windows PowerShell® or the Deployment Image Servicing and Management (DISM) platform.

segment.source: Preinstall Apps Using DISM
segment.target: Preinstall Apps Using DISM

segment.source: Preinstall apps in a Windows image.
segment.target: Preinstall apps in a Windows image.

segment.source: Customize the Start Screen
segment.target: Customize the Start Screen

segment.source: Customize the Start screen to include Windows Store apps and desktop apps that you use in your business.
segment.target: Customize the Start screen to include Windows Store apps and desktop apps that you use in your business.

segment.source: Change the Windows Image to a Higher Edition Using DISM
segment.target: Change the Windows Image to a Higher Edition Using DISM

segment.source: Query an image to determine which edition of Windows the image is, and how to change the image to a higher edition of Windows.
segment.target: Query an image to determine which edition of Windows the image is, and how to change the image to a higher edition of Windows.

segment.source: Export or Import Default Application Associations
segment.target: Export or Import Default Application Associations

segment.source: Change the default programs associated with a file name extension or protocol in a Windows image.
segment.target: Change the default programs associated with a file name extension or protocol in a Windows image.

segment.source: Service a Mounted Windows Image
segment.target: Service a Mounted Windows Image

segment.source: Use DISM to mount an image and modify it.
segment.target: Use DISM to mount an image and modify it.

segment.source: Service an Applied Windows Image
segment.target: Service an Applied Windows Image

segment.source: Use DISM to apply an image and then modify it.
segment.target: Use DISM to apply an image and then modify it.
